TITLE: These five analysts were the best performers of 2021
SUMMARY: Tipranks, an analyst ranking service, reveals the most accurate Wall Street professionals of 2021.

TITLE: Warren Buffett makes over $120 billion on Apple's rise to $3 trillion, among his best bets ever
SUMMARY: The 5% Apple stake Berkshire Hathaway acquired in 2018 for $36 billion is now worth more than $160 billion as the tech giant hit $3 trillion milestone.

TITLE: Here are 4 of Cramer's top stock picks for 2022, including a red-hot oil giant
SUMMARY: Appearing on CNBC's "Halftime Report," Jim Cramer explained why Chevron, Eli Lilly, Honeywell and Bausch Health are some of his favorite stocks for the new year.

TITLE: Cramer says it's impossible to recommend Chinese stocks in a hostile communist regime
SUMMARY: CNBC's Jim Cramer said Wednesday he can't recommend investors buy Chinese stocks because the communist government there is a "total wild card."

TITLE: SpaceX's Starlink internet service has more than 145,000 users so far
SUMMARY: Elon Musk's SpaceX on Thursday gave an update on its Starlink internet service, as the company launched more satellites into orbit.

TITLE: Virgin Galactic stock falls below debut price two years after going public
SUMMARY: Shares of space tourism company Virgin Galactic fell below the level the stock debuted at more than two years ago.

TITLE: Cramer says tech stocks could bottom one day after Nasdaq's nosedive
SUMMARY: The Nasdaq dropped on Wednesday as bond yields rose, but tech stocks could reach a bottom Thursday, said CNBCâ€™s Jim Cramer.

TITLE: Virgin Orbit stock pops more than 20% as Branson's company shows off rocket in Times Square
SUMMARY: Richard Branson's satellite-launching company Virgin Orbit brought a rocket to show off in New York City on Friday, as it celebrated going public.

TITLE: Citigroup will terminate unvaccinated workers by Jan. 31, a first among Wall Street banks
SUMMARY: Citigroup has had the most aggressive vaccine policy among Wall Street firms.

TITLE: Starboard Value has three levers to strengthen profitability at GoDaddy
SUMMARY: The activist hedge fund recently snapped up a 6.5% stake in the web domain company.

TITLE: Wall Street's top analysts like these stocks for the long term as a new year begins
